name: @nolimit/nolimit.js
description: Javascript game loader and API for operators

scripts.dist: npm run dist-dev && npm run dist-min && npm run dist-latest
scripts.dist-min: browserify src/nolimit.js --standalone nolimit -t partialify -t stripify -t uglifyify -o www/dist/nolimit-$npm_package_version.min.js
scripts.jsdoc: jsdoc -t node_modules/minami -q title=nolimit.js -d www/jsdoc package.json src/*.js README.md
scripts.version: npm run dist && git add www/dist/nolimit-*.js && npm run version-www && npm run add-jsdoc
scripts.www: git subtree push --prefix www origin gh-pages

author: Nolimit
